page.title: 20Mr.Cooper's Class B/T School
page.content:
The articles on the previous 19 pages have been written by the children in the 9-11yr. old class at BroadTown C/E Primary School.Our school is a 3 class school.We have about 60 children on roll.We would like to thank the many people in our village who have provided us with interviews & infomation. The photographs we have taken should show you the beautiful countryside that surrounds us and our Victorian school building where much of our work on this project was done.
All of Mr.Cooper's class. July 1985.
